objects.description: Applications and appliances that utilize default username and password should be changed immediately after the installation, and before deployment to a production environment. When possible, applications that use SSH keys should be updated periodically and properly secured. Ensure that local administrator accounts have complex, unique passwords across all systems on the network.

external_references.source_name: US-CERT Alert TA13-175A Risks of Default Passwords on the Internet
external_references.description: undefined. (n.d.). Risks of Default Passwords on the Internet. Retrieved April 12, 2019.
